meanings.definition: A nursery where young children are cared for during the day.
meanings.sent1: The creche at the daycare center is filled with toys and books.
meanings.sent2: Parents drop off their kids at the creche before heading to work.
meanings.sent3: The toddlers in the creche had a mini dance party during snack time.
meanings.sent4: The creche buzzed with laughter and chatter as the children played.
meanings.sent5: The colorful walls of the creche made it a cheerful place for the little ones.

meanings.definition: A representation of the Nativity scene.
meanings.sent1: During Christmas, the church displayed a beautiful creche with figurines.
meanings.sent2: The creche in the town square depicted baby Jesus in a manger.
meanings.sent3: The creche figurines seemed to have a lively conversation in the display.
meanings.sent4: Visitors admired the intricate details of the creche at the holiday fair.
meanings.sent5: The soft glow of the lights added a magical touch to the creche scene.
